script:
1.3
w0dk4 - look in readme for extended credits
http://www.freelancerserver.de
Hamburg City MOD Features:
- ClanReputations & Clanbases
- Hamburg City Base: * Hamburg System, Sector ~5d
- Engine-Shop (at Hamburg City Base)
- Ships flyable: * Enforcer (originally: Juni's Defender) * Seth (improved Anubis, originally: The Order Ship) * Blood Dragon * Armored Transport * CSV (Combat Service Vehicle) * Transport * Train * Liberty Cruiser * Osiris (Clans only) * Nomad Fighter (RPG only) * Liberty Dreadnought (Event only) * Rheinland Battleship (Event only) * Rheinland Cruiser (Event only)
- Special Ships with Cloaking Device: * Valkyre * Banshee * Humpback * Anubis
- Mining Zones & Blaster * in Hamburg System * and in New Tokyo System
- Race System - Neutral Zone (PvP System) - Extended Omicron systems
- New Weapons sold in Neutral Zone: * Novabomb Launcher * Repair Turret
- Enhanced Colony Fighters - Dynamic Economy - Widescreenfix by Adoxa - 4 Strafe blocker by Adoxa (implemented by Viper/w0dk4) - Extended AntiCheat
and some surprises :)
### MBASES.INI ENTRYS
### UNIVERSE & SYSTEM ENTRYS ###
### NEWS ###
#Nach neusten Berichten sollen Nomaden in Omicron Gamma sowie in Dublin (Bretonia) eingefallen sein!\n W‰hrend die Piraten in O.Gamma Probleme haben, die Nomads aufzuhalten, haben sich die 4 H‰user von Sirius zusammengeschlossen und schwere Flotten nach Dublin entsandt. Trotzdem geht von den Nomaden weiterhin eine groﬂe Gefahr in Dublin aus, weswegen dort schon von einigen jungen Freelancer-Piloten die Rede ist, die es leider nicht geschafft haben, den Nomads zu entkommen!\n Auch in Omicron-Gamma und dem dortigen Unkown System sollen schon dutzende Freelancer den Nomaden zum Opfer gefallen sein!\n\n Due to latest reports, Nomads have invaded in Dublin (Bretonia).\n The 4 houses have decided to send massive fleets to intercept the Nomads. However, Freelancers say Dublin is still one of the most dangerous places, so watch your back!\n
#1. No Hacks/Cheats/Bugusing/Insulting!\n\n 2. Newbie-Protection: Do NOT attack lvl 1-20 Newbies in house systems! \n\n 3. Be fair to other Players, no insult words please!
[NewsItem] rank = base_0_rank, mission_end logo = news_flags icon = critical category = 0 headline = 0 ;GENERATESTRRES("! ATTACK OF THE NOMADS - WARNING !") text = 0 ;GENERATEXMLRES(news1) audio = true base = Rh02_08_Base
[NewsItem] rank = base_0_rank, mission_end icon = world logo = news_system_rh2 category = 0 headline = 0 ;GENERATESTRRES("!SERVER RULES!") text = 0 ;GENERATEXMLRES(news2) audio = true base = Rh02_08_Base

-
"Enforcer" Liberty Very Heavy Fighter
†
"The best of the best," this heavily outfitted rig represents the pinnacle of Liberty's technological advances and design savoir faire. With its elevated armor and power rating as standard and the additional mount for firepower, it's no wonder that this ship is the number one choice of the Liberty Armed Forces.
"Blood Dragon" Kusari Very Heavy Fighter
†
"The serpents tooth," this ship is the razor sharp maw of Kusari military knowledge and technology. The Dragon is the coalescence of form and function, blending unbeatable offensive and defensive capabilities and significant cargo space. In the hands of an experienced pilot this ship is not so much a weapon as a force of nature.
"Seth" Order Very Heavy Fighter
!!!Attention, this ship has a high strafepowerusage!!!
There is no profile on this ship, however the readings of the on-board components suggest a ship composed of pieces harvested from multiple houses in Sirius, heavily modified, and then integrated in a radical design.

ids_name = 261647 ids_info = 65887
ids_name = 261647 ids_info = 0 ;GENERATESTRRES("VIPs = Very Important Persons")
